json-ld-name: New Gen Patio - Frequently Asked Questions
q1-title: How do your pergolas differ from wooden pergolas?
q1-answer: Our aluminum pergolas are more durable, weather-resistant, and maintenance-free. They don't warp, crack, or rot and require no staining or sealing.
q2-title: How can I request a free quote?
q2-answer: Call {{phone}} or click the 'Free Quote' button on our website. It's quick and easy!
q3-title: What is the process from start to finish?
q3-step-1: Request a free quote online or call us.
q3-step-3: Receive a formal quote with 3D renderings.
q3-step-4: Sign the approved proposal and submit a 25% deposit.
q3-step-7: Construction begins with our quality assurance.
q3-link-text: Click here to see our full process
q4-title: What payment methods do you accept?
q4-answer: We accept ACH transfers, checks, wire transfers, and credit cards. Flexible payment options available.
q5-title: What materials do you use for the roofing?
q5-answer: We use high-quality insulated aluminum roofing panels with a 3-inch core of compressed styrofoam. We also offer polycarbonate and methacrylate options for natural light filtering.

q7-answer: We are based in Spring, Texas, and serve clients across the entire state, focusing on the Houston area.
